name: Domino Logic (Version 1)
overview: A puzzle game involving dominoes released on Loadstar #061 in 1989. An improved remake/re-release was released ten years later, also on Loadstar. An ingenious random puzzle that dares you to divide a grid of dots into dominoes. Multiple level selections allow you to make this as easy or difficult as you want. Joystick and keyboard controls, color and font controls and an undo command round out the features.
